author: Bill Gates
quote: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.

author: Larry Page
quote: Always deliver more than expected.

author: Elon Musk
quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

author: Mark Zuckerberg
quote: The biggest risk is not taking any risk.

author: Sundar Pichai
quote: A mission statement is not just a document, it’s the way we live every day.

author: Jeff Bezos
quote: If you double the number of experiments you do per year you’re going to double your inventiveness.

author: Tim Cook
quote: Let your joy be in your journey, not in some distant goal.

author: Satya Nadella
quote: Our industry does not respect tradition – it only respects innovation.

author: Jack Ma
quote: You should learn from your competitor, but never copy. Copy and you die.

author: Sheryl Sandberg
quote: Leadership is about making others better as a result of your presence and making sure that impact lasts in your absence.

author: Reed Hastings
quote: Do not tolerate brilliant jerks. The cost to teamwork is too high.

author: Marissa Mayer
quote: I always tell people that the most important thing is to figure out what you're passionate about.

author: Evan Spiegel
quote: If you’re not failing, you’re not innovating enough.

author: Travis Kalanick
quote: It's not about ideas. It's about making ideas happen.

author: Elon Musk
quote: I think it’s possible for ordinary people to choose to be extraordinary.

author: Richard Branson
quote: Business opportunities are like buses, there’s always another one coming.

author: Michael Dell
quote: We are at the forefront of the digital revolution, and the opportunities are endless.

author: Howard Schultz
quote: Success is not an entitlement, it is a result of hard work, perseverance, and resilience.

author: Jack Dorsey
quote: Make every detail perfect and limit the number of details to perfect.

author: Reed Hastings
quote: We’re all trying to make the world a better place through entertainment.

author: Marissa Mayer
quote: You don’t have to be the CEO of a company to make a difference.

author: Larry Ellison
quote: When you innovate, you’ve got to be prepared for people telling you that you are nuts.

author: Eric Schmidt
quote: We always overestimate the change that will occur in the next two years and underestimate the change that will occur in the next ten.

author: Sheryl Sandberg
quote: Done is better than perfect.

author: Steve Wozniak
quote: It’s not a faith in technology. It’s faith in people.

author: Jeff Bezos
quote: If you do build a great experience, customers tell each other about that. Word of mouth is very powerful.

author: Tim Berners-Lee
quote: The Web does not just connect machines, it connects people.

author: Peter Thiel
quote: You should always be thinking about how to make the most of your abilities.

author: Reed Hastings
quote: Great things in business are never done by one person. They’re done by a team of people.

author: Susan Wojcicki
quote: The future of the internet is not about technology, it’s about how you use technology.

author: Dick Costolo
quote: The idea of disrupting what has been the status quo is not new. It’s just been accelerated.

author: Arianna Huffington
quote: Fearlessness is not the absence of fear. It’s the mastery of fear.

author: Jeff Weiner
quote: We believe that the best way to grow our business is by creating a great culture.

author: Marc Benioff
quote: The secret to successful leadership is not being the smartest person in the room.

author: Elon Musk
quote: I would like to die on Mars. Just not on impact.

author: Satya Nadella
quote: The true power of technology is not in the machines, but in the people who use them.

author: Larry Page
quote: You don’t need to have a 100-person company to develop that idea.

author: Mark Zuckerberg
quote: The biggest mistake we made as a company was assuming that if we built a good product, people would come.

author: Reed Hastings
quote: If you don’t have a sense of humor, you’re missing out on one of life’s great pleasures.

author: Travis Kalanick
quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

author: Sheryl Sandberg
quote: Done is better than perfect.

author: Jack Ma
quote: We are never short of ideas. What we lack is the capacity to turn ideas into reality.

author: Sundar Pichai
quote: Let’s make sure we are learning and getting better each day.

author: Mark Zuckerberg
quote: People influence people. Nothing influences people more than a recommendation from a trusted friend.

author: Elon Musk
quote: Some people don't like change, but you need to embrace change if the alternative is disaster.

author: Tim Cook
quote: The most important thing is to focus on the things that matter.

author: Jeff Bezos
quote: One of the only ways to get out of a tight box is to invent your way out.

author: Michael Dell
quote: There are no limits to what can be achieved, if you are willing to put in the effort.

author: Reed Hastings
quote: Netflix has been at the forefront of innovation in the entertainment space.
